Your social network for your local event: Your social network for your local events
Location_request_details:
Wouaf IT will ask for your permission to activate geolocation in your browser. This request will automatically center the map on your location and then simplify your navigation.

We do not store your location on our servers.

You can always change this permission in your browser settings.
Events_details: Concert, Theater, Festival, Exhibition, Tours, Performing arts, Family events, Sport, etc.
Out_details: Hiking, Sport, Tours, Trips, Nightlife, Between friends, Dating, etc.
Purchases / Sales_details: Tips, Automotive, Furniture, Clothing, Appliances, Electronics, Computers, Babycare, Animals, etc.
Donations_details: Books, Furniture, Clothing, Appliances, Electronics, Computers, Babycare, Animals, etc.
Services_details: Personal services, Rent, Education, Home service, Babysitting, Pet Sitting, Carpooling, Accommodation, etc.
Others_details: Anything that does not fit into the above categories!
create_wouaf_it_profile: If you do not have your Wouaf IT profile, it's time to create one! It's free and only takes seconds.
use_wouaf_it_profile: and if you already have your profile, what are you waiting for to login?
We'll never share your email with anyone: We'll never share your email with anyone else.
Facebook_profile_details: By connecting to Wouaf IT with Facebook, you can share your Wouafs on your wall.

welcome_to_wouaf_it:
Welcome in the Wouaf IT community!

An email has been sent to activate your profile.
If it is not enabled under 6h it will be automatically deleted.

You can now create your first Wouaf. Do you want to see how it works?
delete_profile_details:
Are you sure you want to permanently delete your profile?
All your Wouafs will be permanently deleted. Your comments on other Wouafs will be retained.

This action is irreversible! You confirm ?

Sign_with_your_name_details: If you do not check this box, your publications will be signed with your nickname.
Personal_data_details: The informations below are optional and will be public if you fill them. They can give credibility to your publications.
Logout_details: You are disconnected from Wouaf IT. See you soon!
